title: The vvise-woman of Hogsdon A comedie. As it hath been sundry times acted with great applause. Written by Tho: Heyvvood.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
publisher: Printed by M. P[arsons] for Henry Shephard, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancerie-Lane, at the signe of the Bible, between Serjeants-Inne and Fleet-street,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
